title: Revenant

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you are visited for the first time by a Townie, you learn the name and role of your visitor. Your investigative results always turn up favorably when investigated by this player, and you can't be killed by them. You can send them a single fake system message, similar to the Hypnotist.
- Your first visitor will appear to be a Revenant from now on, and investigative results against them will always turn up unfavorably. You can read all of that player's whispers.
- All attacks towards your first visitor are redirected towards you.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Live to see your first visitor die.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.
